dict.string: <!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"> <html> <head> <meta http-equiv="Content-type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" /> <title>${1:${TM_FILENAME/((.+)\..*)?/(?2:$2:Page Title)/}}</title> <link rel="${3:stylesheet}" href="${4:/css/master.css}" type="text/css" media="${5:screen}" title="${6:no title}" charset="${7:utf-8}" /> </head> <body> $0 </body> </html>
